trans-unit.source: Represents settings that define operational characteristics of a host.
trans-unit.target: 代表定義的主應用程式的作業特性的設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.HostSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.HostSettings"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether exception details are included in faults.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否錯誤中包含例外狀況詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if exception details are included in faults; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果例外狀況詳細資料中有錯誤。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定領域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use non-persistent handle.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要使用非持續性的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if non-persistent handle is used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用非持續性的控制代碼。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
